entry.title: Teaching Quantum Field Theory
entry.content:
I’ve started trying to teach quantum field theory casually. The lessons take place roughly fortnightly (every Sunday 8pm on Zoom). Contact me on telegram to sit in! Hopefully I can get enough practice and refine my material such that when I am actually required to teach QFT in a university, I will be confident enough to be a good lecturer!

Here are the slides and recordings (TODO to be uploaded).

Special thanks to Victoris.org for supporting my lessons!
